law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 459, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 406, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 325, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988.
